name: Lion
interestingFacts: Lions are the only cats that live in groups.
A group, or pride, can be up to 30 lions, depending on how much food and water is available.
A lion's roar can be heard from 5 miles away.
Lions are excellent swimmers and can swim up to 5 miles.
Lions can sleep up to 20 hours a day.
A male lion's mane can indicate his age and status in the pride.
Lions can run at speeds of up to 50 mph (80 km/h) for short distances.
